text: James Patrick McGovern (born November 20, 1959) is an American politician. He is a member of the United States House of Representatives, representing since 1997. He is the senior member of the House Rules Committee. McGovern is the chair of the Congressional-Executive Commission on China as well as the co- chair of the Tom Lantos Human Rights Commission. He is a member of the Democratic Party. The district was numbered as the 3rd district from 1997 to 2013. It includes the area from Worcester to the Pioneer Valley. title: Jim McGovern (American politician)
